meanings.definition: Capable of being restored to a state of rest.
meanings.sent1: The cozy chair looked restable after a long day of work.
meanings.sent2: The calm lake was restable after the storm passed.
meanings.sent3: The tired puppy found a restable spot under the shady tree.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a storm, but the meditation made it restable.
meanings.sent5: The soft pillow provided a restable place for her head.

meanings.definition: Able to be put back into a state of rest.
meanings.sent1: The restless child finally found a restable position in bed.
meanings.sent2: The yoga class helped her achieve a restable state of mind.
meanings.sent3: The jumpy squirrel found a restable moment to enjoy its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The chaotic room became restable after a thorough cleaning.
meanings.sent5: The soothing music created a restable atmosphere in the room.
